Class MessageGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.epzilla.leader.message.MessageGenerator

public class MessageGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class used to generate messages to send using RMI to other nodes.

getMessage

public static java.lang.String getMessage(int messageCode)
Return the message type according to the header value. When a new message type added, place the message Id here

Parameters:
messageCode -
Returns:
if a valid message => message type, if not => null
